name: Prank Heart
description:
Phantom Theif vs Detective Slapstick online battle action!!!
You can also have fun with someone or your friends online!


You can play as a Phantom Theif or Detective, and fight with each other.

Phantom Theif


Blend in the crowd.
And, steal lots of treasures!


Detective


Find and arrest the Phantom Theivs!
Whatever it takes.


Various Items


Make full use of exciting items!


Multiple Maps


Battle on unique maps!



Custom Rules


Custom the game as you want!
Various customizations are possible.
